thread.title: Scream Queens star Lea Michele is body confident: "I love my butt - it is a showstopper" - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Scream Queens star Lea Michele is body confident: "I love my butt - it is a showstopper" - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Naomi Gordon
title: Scream Queens star Lea Michele is body confident: "I love my butt - it is a showstopper" - Showbiz
text: Lea Michele has confessed that her "butt" is her favourite body part, and she has high praise indeed for it.The former Glee star shared her body confidence with Marie Claire, revealing: "I love my butt. It is a showstopper." © Boe Marion/Marie ClaireLea Michele for Marie Claire Michele currently stars as Hester Ulrich in Brad Falchuk, Ian Brennan and Ryan Murphy's comedy slasher series Scream Queens on Fox.Speaking about the highs and lows of fame following her breakthrough in Glee, she continued to the publication: "Everybody thinks you're a star with roses being dropped at your feet. "You have to take some f**king punches. Now I have my groove. I am much more aware. I also don't care as much. I am very content with me." © Boe Marion/Marie Claire The actress also touched on the loss of boyfriend and former Glee co-star Corey Monteith and the "struggle" of coping with bereavement. "Getting to the other side takes a lot of work," she recalled. "All you can do is get to the other side. It's a struggle. "When you do, there is happiness there. It's important to me to keep private some of that process with how I got here. But I am here, I am good, and I am very grateful for that," she added. © Boe Marion/Marie Claire Scream Queens airs on Fox in the US and will come to E4 this autumn.Lea Michele appears on the cover of Marie Claire's November issue, available on newsstands on October 20.
